name: Euglena Simulator
description:
This game is made for this jam: Weekly Game Jam - Week 278

Unfortunately I couldn't finish it as I started on the last day (The Euglena doesn't even have a Flagellum). I've always wanted to code physics. This jam gives me a good topic to start with. The game is about observing the Euglena eating bacteria that you can place by right-clicking on the screen. You can also middle-click to summon another specimen of Euglena.

Controls

Left Click - Euglena will move to the clicked position (it works if there are no food around)

Right Click - Place a Bacteria (Food)

Middle Click - Summon a Euglena (Max. 5)
